clients.title: Voice-First: Get a Featured Snippet on Google or Bing
description: Featured snippets can help you rank well for voice search results on Google or Bing. Some helpful ways to gain a featured snippet from your website or blog include:
items: Creating content that answers a specific question & Identifying questions that you will be able to answer in great detail
Using conversational language — write like you’re talking to a friend
Thinking of semantic keywords, different ways of saying the same thing (i.e., synonyms)
Including keywords toward the front of the very first sentence/paragraph

jld.title: Add a Narrative Bio to Your Free Justia Lawyer Directory Profile
description: We recommend adding a well-written biography to your Justia Lawyer Directory profile that highlights your practice and shows off your passion for the law. While you may discuss your educational and professional experience, this section is really targeted for weaving a narrative about your entire practice so that a potential client can understand you and your law firm in a way that mere biographical facts cannot communicate.
